text: Marco the Magnificent is a 1965 French Italian Egyptian Afghan Serbian adventure movie directed by Denys de la Patellière and starring Omar Sharif, Anthony Quinn, Horst Buchholz, Orson Welles, Akim Tamiroff, Elsa Martinelli, Robert Hossein, Guido Alberti. ==Other websites== * Category:1965 adventure movies Category:1960s historical movies Category:French adventure movies Category:Italian adventure movies Category:Egyptian movies Category:Afghan movies Category:Serbian movies Category:Movies directed by Denys de la Patellière Category:Movies set in the 13th century Category:Movies set in the 14th century Category:Movies set in China Category:Movies set in Italy Category:Movies set in Mongolia
title: Marco the Magnificent
